original_text: The Israelites forgot to serve the Lord their God. They did things that he saw were evil. They worshipped idols of Baal and Asherah.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하여 자기들의 하나님 여호와를 잊어버리고 바알들과 아세라들을 섬긴지라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites forgot to serve the Lord their God.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 주 그들의 하나님을 섬기는 것을 잊었다.

sentences.original_text: They did things that he saw were evil.
